import React from "react" class Users extends React.Component { usersList = [ { id: 1, firstname: "Maksim", lastname: "Lebedko", placeOfWork: "SDvor", age: 13, isRich: false }, { id: 2, firstname: "Gosha", lastname: "Pavlikov", placeOfWork: "SDvor", age: 21, isRich: true }, { id: 3, firstname: "Ruslan", lastname: "Djambekov", placeOfWork: "Kontora", age: 41, isRich: true }, { id: 4, firstname: "Dima", lastname: "Kukan", placeOfWork: "Kawaii", age: 15, isRich: true } ] render() { if (this.usersList.length > 0) return (
{this.usersList.map((user) => (

{user.firstname}{user.lastname}

{user.placeOfWork}

{user.isRich == true ? "Rick :)" : "Poor :c"}
))}
) else return (

A list of users is empty

) } } export default Users
